Posts.Title: Being very scared about biopsy

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your kind words Gay, it means so much to have people that understand and will listen.  I feel in limbo at the moment and today I’m in pain from the biopsy which is making me very miserable xx

Posts.Title: Being very scared about biopsy

Posts.Content: Thank you Sue for your reply, monsters week for results (a lifetime!)  You’re kind words mean more than you’ll ever know  Emma xxxx
Posts.Title: Being very scared about biopsy

Posts.Content: Hi, I’m a complete mess! Yesterday I had a mammogram as a couple of lumps were found in my left breast, it was clear and then had to have an ultrasound which they said was because my Breasts have a few lumpy what they think are fibro lumps/glands? and because the breast tissue is very dense they wanted me to have a biopsy. They said they didn’t think it was anything to worry about at all and were doing it just for a precaution but I just can’t think positively, having to wait is killing me, I’m a complete and utter emotional wreck, my partner keeps saying but it was clear they didn’t see anything it will be fine and they won’t find anything as do my family and friends but I just can’t get my head round it and can’t function one bit. I keep doing the what ifs and maybes and I know I’m making myself sick with worry and bringing everyone down around me.....
Posts.Title: Being very scared about biopsy
